page_content: The page discusses tax law changes and property valuation in the Canton of Aargau.
The page provides various financial templates and documents for accounting and financial management.
The page discusses community meeting places for families and their importance for child development.
The page discusses the accessibility features of the Kanton Aargau website, mentioning web technologies like HTML5, CSS3, and WAI-ARIA.
The page provides information and forms for submitting building applications related to agriculture in the Canton of Aargau.
The page provides information on the EasyTax software for electronic tax filing, including download links and guides.
The page provides information on the iEWS online tool for geothermal energy site analysis, including guidelines and conditions for usage.
